DOC.brief_summary: After obtain approval Institutional Review Board institution , write informed consent obtain patient undergoing interventional cerebral aneurysm coil procedure enrol prospective study randomly allocate one two group : Group-C ( n=10 ) Group-HES ( n=10 ) . All recruit patient give patient identification number ( PIN ) present study 01-20 accord order interview recruitment . Investigators prepare 10 yellow 10 green card , insert 20 thick-paper envelope . Then , envelope seal , mixed randomly allocate get number 01 20 ( Envelop number ) . After print envelope number outside envelope , seal envelope card convey keep pharmacy department . According color card , attend anesthesiologist give crystalloid yellow card HES green card , respectively , maintain stroke volume variation < 15 volume control ventilation ( 8 ml/kg tidal volume ) O2/air mixture . Patient data statistical analysis : Patient 's data whole blood viscosity , PaO2 , FiO2 , Hemoglobin , urine amount , s-glucose determine patient ' medical record patient 's discharge . All statistical analysis perform 20th patient 's discharge data acquisition
DOC.brief_title: Impact Intravascular Fluid Resuscitation Whole Blood Viscosity
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo coil embolization procedure due cerebral aneurysm Patients provide write informed consent . Patients preoperative serum hemoglobin concentration > 13 g/dL ( male ) > 12 g/dL ( female ) Patients PaO2/FiO2 ratio > 150 Patients history anemia , dyspnea , active infection . Patients endocrine disease Patients receive receive intraoperative preoperative blood salvage , allogenic blood transfusion , antiplatelet drug , antifibrinolytic agent recombinant human erythropoietin , undergo acute normovolemic hemodilution .
DOC.keyword: cerebral aneurysm , coil embolization , blood viscosity
